attributes.action: Ban the teaching of the existence of a god in all state schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The teaching of religion should be kept in churches or mosques NOT in schools.  There is currently absolutely no evidence of the existence of a god and it is therefore not right that our children should be taught superstitious nonsense as truth.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the teaching of the existence of a god in all state schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19072
